item.content:encoded: Image: YouTube via Polygon On Tuesday, YouTube launched its free games feature for mobile and desktop YouTube launched a new feature on Tuesday: free mobile games you can play right in the app or on your desktop. After several months of testing the feature with YouTube Premium subscribers, the sub-100-game platform hybrid is now out for all users, and it‚Äôs, unsurprisingly, disappointing. item.content:encoded: Image: Bungie This good boy went to Neptune Archie returns to Destiny 2 with a trip to the Neomuna following the May 28, 2024, weekly reset. This is the final step in a series of ‚ÄúWhere in the System is Archie‚Äù quests in the wake of the Into the Light update ‚Äî which have been staggered out week-by-week in the lead up to The Final Shape. Note this quest expires on the June 3 weekly reset ‚Äî a full day before The Final Shape launches on June 4. This is because Bungie will take Destiny 2 down for ...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: Alice Jovan√©e/Polygon | Source images: Various Get a jump start on Father‚Äôs Day with our favorite gift ideas In case you forgot, Father‚Äôs Day is right around the corner ‚Äî June 16, to be exact. item.content:encoded: Image: Maxis / Electronic Arts Two new kits hit the Gallery on May 30 The next The Sims 4 kits are all about resting and relaxing. There‚Äôs plenty of DLC for The Sims 4, which ranges from big, game-changing expansions to smaller and more aesthetically focused kits. With the Riviera Retreat and Cozy Bistro kits, players will be able to create new poolside set-ups, or customize a cozy bistro to their tastes. The pool used to be a much scarier spot for Sims to hang out, back in the days when playe...

item.content:encoded: Image: Bungie Destiny 2‚Äôs upcoming ‚Äúplanet‚Äù is both familiar and deeply weird The Pale Heart ‚Äî the new location in Destiny 2: The Final Shape, which is located inside The Traveler ‚Äî is more like a Destiny-themed funhouse than a completely new destination.
